com.mapdigit.gis.vector

Class GeoSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.vector.GeoSet

  • public final class GeoSet
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store driving directions results

    © Copyright 2009 Guidebee Pty Ltd.

      • getMapFeatureLayerCount

        Returns:
        the number of map layers in the map layer collection.

      • insertMapFeatureLayer

        public void insertMapFeatureLayer(MapFeatureLayer mapLayer,
                         int index)
        Inserts the specified map layer to map's layer collection at the specified index. Each map layer in map's layer collection with an index greater or equal to the specified index is shifted upward to have an index one greater than the value it had previously.
        Parameters:
        mapLayer - the map layer to insert.
        index - where to insert the new map layer.

      • moveMapFeatureLayer

        public void moveMapFeatureLayer(int from,
                       int to)
        Moves a layer in the Layer collection to change the order in which layers are drawn.
        Parameters:
        from - Index number of the layer to move. The topmost layer is 0.
        to - New location for the layer. For example, if you want it to be the second layer, use 1

      • removeMapFeatureLayer

        Remove a map layer from map's layer collection.
        Parameters:
        mapLayer - map layer to be removed.

        Returns:
